Package depgraph.Configurator

Class Configurator

java.lang.Object
depgraph.Configurator.Configurator
public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for parsing and handling command-line arguments passed to the program. List of possible flags: - s DOT file to process - d directory of DOT files to process. - h print help menu Run in gradle using (replace ... with desired arguments): gradle run --args="..." Otherwise pass arguments normally.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String nameOfDirectory
    Name of a directory, if the passed argument is a directory.
    private java.lang.String nameOfFile
    Name of file, if the passed argument is a single file.

    • manageCmdLineArguments

      public ConfigType manageCmdLineArguments​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Parses command-line arguments and processes/responds to them.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments passed from main.
      Returns:
      Type of handle for the reader to process (FILE, DIRECTORY, NONE)

    • help

      private void help()
      Prints help menu to stdout.

    • processSingleFile

      private boolean processSingleFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Checks if the passed file exists and sets the class attribute if it does.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file.
      Returns:
      True if param was an existing file and class attribute was set, false otherwise.

    • processDirectory

      Checks if the passed directory exists and sets the class attribute if it does.
      Parameters:
      directoryName - name of the directory.
      Returns:
      True if param was an existing directory and class attribute was set, false otherwise.
